alert.note: Alert for Northern Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 24 at 1:00AM AKST until February 24 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with periods of blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Visibility one quarter mile or less at times. * WHERE...Northern Arctic Coast. * WHEN...Until noon AKST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Blowing snow will cause whiteout conditions. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Conditions will improve Friday afternoon as winds decrease.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
